DOC.brief_title: Oral Health Training Program Pediatric Residents
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : To compare addition Hands Training ( HOT ) Web Based Training ( WBT ) resident ' skill , confidence , opinion practice . Methods : Pediatric resident participate WBT preventive oral health . Then WBT subject randomly assign receive HOT dentist , WBT alone . All subject assess skill performance oral exam , direct observation . Residents ' confidence regard oral health counseling , opinion importance incorporation oral health well child visit , measure survey utilize Likert scale . Residents ' change practice assess retrospective chart audit .
